nodes.text: Tuluh was a general in the Yomo Council, a faction which broke away from the Galactic Empire after the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY. In 5 ABY, the 204th Imperial Fighter Wing, which served the Imperial loyalists, was sent to devastate the planet Fedovoi End, where the Yomo Council was based. Soran Keize, the fighter wing's commanding officer, cited Tuluh and Governor Brashan as among the individuals he was going to wipe out during the 204th's attack when he made an announcement to Fedovoi End. The 204th then proceeded to open up gas pockets from the world's ice caps, poisoning Fedovoi End and its population.
Tuluh was mentioned in the 2021 novel Victory's Price, written by Alexander Freed.
